actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to pay at least as much to use privately owned farms for grain storage as is paid to commercial storage facilities for such purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to direct the Commodity Credit Corporation to pay on-farm grain storage rates at not less than commercial rates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to pay at least as much to use privately owned farms for grain storage as is paid to commercial storage facilities for such purposes.
